You can use mapslices in Julia but map on eachcol is recommended because its faster.
```p = 3
k = 4
A = zeros(p,k)
map(f, eachcol(A)  # Where f is a func```
Mapslices equivalent implementation:
```mapslices(f, A, dims=1)```
